```{r}
some_words <- data.frame(word = c("sick", "unwell", "ill", "ailing"))
some_words_connections <- apply(some_words, 1, get_connected_words, glove_matrix)

words_flat <- table(as.vector(some_words_connections))
word_counts_df <- as.data.frame(words_flat, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
colnames(word_counts_df) <- c("word", "count")

word_counts_df %>%
	arrange(desc(count)) %>%  
  slice(1:40)
```
